item.title: About me
item.description: What do I like about being a BA? What don't I like about being a BA? What do I bring to the table? Expertise Presentation Leadership Business Analysis SDLC Agile / Scrum / Waterfall Elicitation Interviews JAD sessions User Stories Wire Frames & Mock-ups UML Diagrams Data Modeling Flowcharts Process Flows Web development iOS development APIs development SQL Python HTML JIRA/Confluence HPQC MS Visio MS Office
